text: قالوا۟ بشرنك بالحق فلا تكن من القنطين

translations.translation: They said, 'We bring you good news of the truth, so do not be among those who despair.'
We have given you the happy tidings of a truth," they replied. "So do not be one of those who despair."
They said: "The good tiding we give you is of truth. Do not, therefore, be of those who despair."
They said, "We have given you the glad news for a true reason so do not despair".
They said, “We have given you true tidings, therefore do not lose hope.”
They said: "We give you good news in truth. So do not be of those who despair."
They said: We give you good news with truth, therefore be not of the despairing.
give me good tidings?' They said, 'We give thee good tidings of truth. Be not of those that despair.'
They said: We bring thee good tidings in truth. So be not thou of the despairing.
They said, "We have, indeed, given you glad tidings in truth; do not therefore despair."
They said: we bear tidings of a truth; be then thou not of the desponding.
They said, ‘We bring you good news in truth; so do not be despondent.’
They said: "We give thee glad tidings in truth: be not then in despair!"
They (the angels) said: "We give you glad tidings in truth. So be not of the despairing ones."
They replied: 'In truth we have given you glad tidings, do not be one of those who despair'
They said, “We bring you good news in truth, so do not despair.”
They said, "We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing."
[15:55] They said, ‘We give you good tidings in truth, sincerely; so do not be of the despairing’, the despondent.
(They said: We bring thee good tidings in truth) that you will have a son. (So be not thou of the despairing) in relation to having a son.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { قَالُواْ بَشَّرْنَاكَ } ملتبساً { بِٱلْحَقِّ } المطابق للواقع بإذن الحق، وعلى مقتدى قدرته الكاملة بإيجاد شيء بلا سبق السبب العادي له { فَلاَ تَكُن } أيها النبي المتمكن في مقام الرضا والتسليم، المسند المفوِّض جميع الحوادث الكائنة في علام الكون والفساد إلى الفاعدل المختار بلا اعتبار الوسائل والأسباب { مِّنَ ٱلْقَانِطِينَ } [الحجر: 55] الجازمين بفقدان الشيء عند فقدان أسبابه العادية

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { قالوا بشرناك بالحق }: باليقين الثابت الذي لا محالة في وقوعه، فلا تستبعده، ولا تشك فيه، { فلا تكن من القانطين }: من الآيسين، فإن الله تعالى قادر على أن يخلق بشراً من غير أبوين، فكيف من شيخ فانٍ وعجوز عاقرٍ
